text: You are a helpful assistant. Summarize the following note in two sentences: The campus energy audit highlighted that classrooms waste electricity when lights remain on overnight.
Provide a concise weather report for Columbia, SC based on these readings: temperature 78F, humidity 65%, wind 10mph southwest.
Role-play as a lab TA responding to a student who cannot launch llama.cpp due to missing CUDA drivers. Give two troubleshooting steps.
